title: is it possible to rollback from android 11 developer beta preview on pixel 3 with locked bootloader?
content:
hello!
I sideloaded my pixel 3 from verizon (with locked bootlader) to andoid 11 developer preview 1 (blueline-ota-rpp1.200123.016-c2191743). few days ago i receive ota update to beta preview 2, and sensors(such as proximity) stop working.

I tried to sideload full ota image of andoid 10 or developer preview 2 with no luck because this errors:
adb: sideload connection failed: closed
adb: trying pre-KitKat sideload method...
adb: pre-KitKat sideload connection failed: closed

is there any way to rollback to android 10? and whta to do next? just wait for next ota? will i finally receive public beta and then final release?
or should i buy new phone, because everyday using now is impossible due to many bugs and broken android pay?
